fields.name: No poverty
fields.description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
fields.description_en: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
fields.description_es: Poner fin a la pobreza en todas sus formas en todo el mundo

fields.name: Zero hunger
fields.description_es: Poner fin al hambre, lograr la seguridad alimentaria y la mejora de la nutrición y promover la agricultura sostenible

fields.name: Good health and well-being
fields.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
fields.description_en: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
fields.description_es: Garantizar una vida sana y promover el bienestar para todos en todas las edades

fields.name: Quality education
fields.description_es: Garantizar una educación inclusiva, equitativa y de calidad y promover oportunidades de aprendizaje durante toda la vida para todos

fields.name: Gender equality
fields.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
fields.description_en: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
fields.description_es: Garantizar el acceso a una energía asequible, segura, sostenible y moderna para todos

fields.name: Clean water and sanitation
fields.description: Ensure access to water and sanitation for all
fields.description_en: Ensure access to water and sanitation for all
fields.description_es: Garantizar la disponibilidad de agua y su gestión sostenible y el saneamiento para todos

fields.name: Affordable and clean energy
fields.description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy
fields.description_en: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy
fields.description_es: Garantizar el acceso a una energía asequible, segura, sostenible y moderna para todos

fields.name: Decent work and economic growth
fields.description: Promote inclusive and sustainable economic growth, employment and decent work for all
fields.description_en: Promote inclusive and sustainable economic growth, employment and decent work for all
fields.description_es: Promover el crecimiento económico sostenido, inclusivo y sostenible, el empleo pleno y productivo y el trabajo decente para todos

fields.name: Industry, innovation and infrastructure
fields.description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
fields.description_en: Build resilient infrastructure, promote sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
fields.description_es: Construir una infraestructura resistente, promover la industrialización sostenible y fomentar la innovación

fields.name: Reduced inequalities
fields.description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
fields.description_en: Reduce inequality within and among countries
fields.description_es: Reducir la desigualdad en y entre los países

fields.name: Sustainable cities and communities
fields.description: Make cities inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
fields.description_en: Make cities inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
fields.description_es: Lograr que las ciudades y los asentamientos humanos sean inclusivos, seguros, resilientes y sostenibles

fields.name: Responsible consumption and production
fields.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
fields.description_en: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
fields.description_es: Garantizar modalidades de consumo y producción sostenibles

fields.name: Climate action
fields.description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
fields.description_en: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
fields.description_es: Adoptar medidas urgentes para combatir el cambio climático y sus efectos

fields.name: Life below water
fields.description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources
fields.description_en: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources
fields.description_es: Conservar y utilizar en forma sostenible los océanos, los mares y los recursos marinos para el desarrollo sostenible

fields.name: Life on land
fields.description: Sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, halt and reverse land degradation, halt biodiversity loss
fields.description_en: Sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, halt and reverse land degradation, halt biodiversity loss
fields.description_es: Gestionar sosteniblemente los bosques, luchar contra la desertificación, detener e invertir la degradación de las tierras y detener la pérdida de biodiversidad

fields.name: Peace, justice and strong institutions
fields.description: Promote just, peaceful and inclusive societies
fields.description_en: Promote just, peaceful and inclusive societies
fields.description_es: Promover sociedades, justas, pacíficas e inclusivas

fields.name: Partnerships for the goals
fields.description: Revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
fields.description_en: Revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
fields.description_es: Revitalizar la Alianza Mundial para el Desarrollo Sostenible
